body: I think I like this style. Maybe because they look younger, but despite having less unique art style, the girls seems easier to get along with. The current girls have that smile like they enjoy doing footjob. The guys also have friendlier air to them, at least their default expression doesn't look like they're annoyed.

When I was reading this, the thought came to mind "This ain't Kakao's art. The boobs aren't beautiful. The art ain't spectacular. It's the equivalent of third rate vanilla that can't even get me aroused." AND THEN I found out it was his old art. Now it all makes sense.
Man, Kakao's current artstyle to this is like Night and Day. You wouldn't be able to tell its from the same artist. They really improved.
ooooh sht, it's Kakao's old art style
I thought the girls look younger than kakao's usual design. Then after looking at the last page, so this is from 2015
